channel.title: Comments on: Sigh
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Me
item.dc:creator: Me
item.description:
You might enjoy playing an ARG that I have been involved with for quite some time...I can see you enjoying it.
Let me know if you like that sort of thing and I shall introduce you to the rabbit so you can follow him down the rabbit hole.
item.content:encoded:
You might enjoy playing an ARG that I have been involved with for quite some time…I can see you enjoying it.

Let me know if you like that sort of thing and I shall introduce you to the rabbit so you can follow him down the rabbit hole.
